markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spyglass Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2159)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Polished to a perfect surface and incredibly clear, this special [_magical prosthetic eye_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2156) allows you to clearly see small details as well as things a great distance away.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** A magical lens of hardened air comes into being in front of the eye, allowing you to see as though you were looking through a [fine spyglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=54) for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spyglass Eye
